Title: Add a full-width / full-height background image
Description: And re-do the jumbotron to look like the mockup

Title: Named view and explicit render in controller
Description: Make the template names and controller actions names different.  This will require explicit `render` calls.

Title: Dynamically generate the columns
Description: Create an array of hashes or objects and use erb (or haml) to iterate over the array in a each block.

Title: Convert to haml
Description: Once you have it working in erb, convert it to haml.  Requires installing the gem and renaming the view template names
